box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #000000; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div:
从Aave平台借入350M DAI，500M USDC以及150M USDT；
从Uniswap平台借入32.1M BEAN；
从SushiSwap平台借入11.6M LUSD

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 238px; height: 1px; padding-top: 441px; margin-left: 227px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #000000; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div: 使用借入的DAI、USDC、USDT在Curve DAI/USDC/USDT流动性矿池中，铸造出980个流动性代币3Crv

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 238px; height: 1px; padding-top: 601px; margin-left: 227px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #000000; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div:
将15M 3Crv兑换成 LUSD；
将965M 3Crv添加流动性获得795,425,740 BEAN3CRV-f；
将32.1M BEAN以及 LUSD添加流动性，获取59 BEAN3CRV-f

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 238px; height: 1px; padding-top: 761px; margin-left: 227px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #000000; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div: 使用上面得到的所有BEAN3CRV-f对恶意提案进行投票，使提案通过并执行

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 238px; height: 1px; padding-top: 921px; margin-left: 227px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #000000; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div: 窃取合约中的36,084,584 BEAN, 0.54 UNIV2(BEAN-WETH), 874,663,982 BEAN3Crv及60,562,844 BEANLUSD-f

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 238px; height: 1px; padding-top: 1091px; margin-left: 227px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #000000; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div: 归还闪电贷资金，并将获利兑换为ETH，转出
